noel.title: Noel Raffle
noel.slogan: New Year is a fresh start. It's time to leave the past behind and step into tomorrow filled with new hopes. Look forward with optimism, explore the beauties of life, and share them with your loved ones. May the New Year bring you happiness, health, and success! 🌟 🎉
noel.description: Add the participants and complete the draw. We will generate random pairings for you and send you the participant for whom you need to receive a gift to your email address. Happy New Year in advance! ✨

place.participantAdded: Successfully added; Add the next participant. 🎅🏻
place.name: Name
place.emailAlreadyTaken: You've already used this email for this raffle.
place.dontWorry: Don't worry if you make a mistake! In the next step, you can edit and delete participants. ✨
place.maximumParticipant: The number of participants cannot exceed 500
place.checkAndCompleteRaffle: Check your participant list and complete the raffle. 🎅🏻
place.successfullyMessage: Raffle successfully completed. Please check your emails.
place.giftAdded: successfully added; Add the next gift. ✨
place.dontWorryGift: Don't worry if you make a mistake! In the last step, you can edit and delete gifts. ✨
